programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Strangest Things Ever Stolen
programme.desc: More than money makes the crime world go round. You won’t believe the odd array of goods that have been stolen over the years -- and the motivations behind the thefts.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Killings That Shook a College Community
programme.desc: A young boy and his family's housekeeper are brutally killed in an upscale Omaha neighborhood. Their case goes cold for years, until another double homicide reveals the link and unmasks a serial killer.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: A Family Man's Exciting Fresh Start
programme.desc: Nick packed up his family and moved to Savannah to be closer to nature. But since the move, he hasn’t been able to disconnect from work. Kinga takes him away from his desk to explore what the great state of Georgia has to offer.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Devoted Dad Finding Love is Icing on the Cake
programme.desc: Entre, a single dad and musician, searches for his perfect partner in Des Moines. Three bachelorettes compete for a coveted second date. From spirited bar games and paddling on the lake to sweet bakery moments, who will take the cake?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Dramatic Car Chases
programme.desc: Witness extreme car chases captured on video, from fleeing via fire truck to off-roading into a corn field. Fortunately no one is seriously hurt – except, at times, the vehicles.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Downtown Duels
programme.desc: Rob searches for secret rooms, blows off some steam and fire, and finds himself challenged to a duel when he ventures deep into Downtown Boston.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Huge Evidence Hauls Seen on the Force
programme.desc: Whether it’s gathering thousands of mysterious, colorful packets stuffed in a store’s ceiling or valuable wildlife slithering to freedom, investigators must be ready to decisively face a range of mammoth tasks in the field.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Furnishing a Daughter’s Dream
programme.desc: After receiving an email from an 11 year old girl the guys jump into action to help her single mother of 4 furnish their new apartment. Justin quickly realizes they need more help than he anticipated, and now must scramble to fulfill his promise.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: The Best Surprises
programme.desc: From unexpected celebrations to life-changing gifts, this episode showcases incredible surprises that will warm your heart.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: A Second Chance At Love
programme.desc: Divorcee and single mom Kristen, is ready to get back out there and find a romantic connection. She’ll explore a tabletop board game bar, bowl a few games, and throw some axes as she dates around Kansas City.

programme.title: Restaurants on the Radar
programme.sub-title: Restaurants on the Radar: Florida Flavors
programme.desc: Customizable sandwiches and crispy alligator bites? Orlando’s food scene has it all and avid foodie Brendan O’Connor is taking you to all the best spots on his radar, from cat cafes to Florida’s finest dining destinations.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: NYC Ramen Master Takes On “Famous” Seafood Fanatic in Culinary Color Challenge
programme.desc: Veteran NYC Chef Ten Vong squares up against Jimmy's Famous Seafood rep Charlie Wickboldt. Watch these chefs transform their colorful careers into even more colorful plates. Who will find the tomato trophy at the end of the rainbow?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Double Amputee’s Inspiring Ride
programme.desc: Three years after his double amputation, Jeff in Albuquerque is ready to reconnect with nature. Kinga is there to root him on as he takes on challenging and inspiring outdoor adventures.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Po' Boys and Jokes
programme.desc: Local comedy duos debate the best po' boys in the city, get fit and flexible, discover vintage threads and more on two cheap "dates" in New Orleans.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: A Mother's Nightmare: The Desperate Search for Cupcake
programme.desc: Three-year-old Kamille McKinney, affectionately known as "Cupcake," is abducted while playing outside a relative's Birmingham home. The ensuing search unifies the city, as residents pray she will be found alive.

programme.title: Widowed At 19
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Two high school sweethearts had their love story cut too short.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit : How Art and Mixology Meet Up in Santa Fe
programme.desc: Kate explores gin and rituals with a master distiller, talks art and cocktails with an Indigenous painter, and gets a lesson in moving mixology on George R.R. Martin’s adventure train in the high-desert city of Santa Fe.

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.sub-title: The Lost Children of Carlisle
programme.desc: A powerful look at the history of Native American boarding schools as told through the stories of tribal members and their surviving family members, who endured an educational system founded on the concept “Kill the Indian in him, and save the man.”

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.sub-title: West by Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Band's Homecoming Hits High Note For Generosity
programme.desc: Who says you can't go home again? The team travels back to where it all began to pay back the kindness they experienced 25 years ago when they first got started.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Sacramento: Going Vegetarian
programme.desc: Seasonal ingredients are the stars of any dish, and Chef Chris Barnum-Dann and Chef Brett Bohlmann prove it in this fully vegetarian episode. Will the judges fawn over their flavors, or will they miss the meat?

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Be the Captain of Your Own Adventure in Mount Dora, FL
programme.desc: Where else can you pilot your own catamaran before ordering up a slice of sushi pizza? If that’s not enough, you can also spend the night in a cozy barn, enjoy a cocktail at Funky Monkey and savor the mystery at Magical Meat Boutique.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Single-Mom With a Heart of Gold Looking for Her Family Man
programme.desc: Amy, a 26-year-old single mom, takes a shot at three blind dates. Will things putt around with Jesus, will she make a splash with Quashon, or will she find sanctuary with Jake?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Couples Committing Wild Crimes
programme.desc: A duo pulls a Bonnie and Clyde in a truck stolen from a dealership, and a pair takes money from a monastery. These shocking stories of couples in crime have to be witnessed to be believed.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: A Surprise Tribute to a New Hampshire Father Battling Cancer
programme.desc: The team creates a beautiful sculpture for a New Hampshire dad battling terminal cancer so his family can remember him even when he's gone.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief, Jeff Dengate spotlights inspiring runners making a difference.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Cops & Robbers
programme.desc: From a coffeeshop chain to snowy railroad tracks, these unconventional crime scenes bring the childhood game of Cops & Robbers to life.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Running on Empty & Finishing with Family
programme.desc: Justin pushes body and mind through seven brutal marathons on seven continents in seven days. From frostbite in Antarctica to his daughter joining him for the final steps in Miami, this is the most intense and inspiring challenge of his life.
